extension.name: EmailDragDrop
extension.description: File an email using Drag and Drop from an email program like Outlook or Thunderbird or AppleMail, etc.
extension.comments: There is one extra config step before the module will work where you need to set up the location of the drop target. Note: This module will not work with webmail, at least not the way you would expect. It needs to be an actual email program.
